comments.creator: willsthompson@gmail.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

Windows 7 Aero Glass, FF5 not maximized, some tabs open, Find Bar visible - then hover over a link.


Actual results:

The glass "glaze" effect (seems what people are calling it) on the left and right sides of the window jumps down several pixels, and then moves back when you are no longer hovering over the link.


Expected results:

The glaze effect should not change.

This is identical to "Bug 633282 - Aero glass glaze effect jumps down when status info overlay appears," except that now it happens if you have the find bar open.
